name: Automouse
description:
Automouse is a 2D puzzle game where the player guides a self-propelled mouse by manipulating its interactions with the environment. 

Current Features
  • 3 playable levels set outside and within a house
  • A tutorial to teach the mechanics
  • Menus for navigating between the main menu, tutorial, and game
Credits

This game is being developed for the MICA  Senior Thesis course by Ariana Candido,  Hongbing Pan, and Samuel Hudgins.
